instanceValue.description: The new domain for the clone. Domain labels cannot be longer than 63 characters and must conform to [RFC1035](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1035). Domains must be unique on Linode's platform, including across different Linode accounts; there cannot be two Domains representing the same domain.
